column1: The Purple Pig////I was staying across the street and decided to pop in for dinner with a few coworkers
column2: not realizing how popular this place is. We were able to get seated in the back
column3: at a bar-top overlooking the kitchen/prep area
column4: which ended up being pretty cool because we got to see just about everything on the menu. The bone marrow is a pretty popular choice here
column5: however we opted for the pork belly
column7: despite service being a little slow. Highly recommend!
